api_discovery_realtime.name: API Discovery (realtime)
api_discovery_realtime.description: Diagnostic sensor: exposes all raw fields from the homeCountData API response as attributes. Useful for troubleshooting.

api_discovery_slow.name: API Discovery (slow data)
api_discovery_slow.description: Diagnostic sensor: exposes all raw fields from the slow data endpoints (energy stats, AI settings) as attributes. Useful for troubleshooting.

smart_link_mode.name: Smart Link Mode
smart_link_mode.description: Enables or disables AI smart link mode. When active, the system automatically optimizes energy usage based on solar generation, battery state, and grid prices.

basic_discharge.name: Basic Discharge
basic_discharge.description: Enables or disables battery discharge in basic mode. Use together with 'Discharge Power' to set a fixed discharge rate.

anti_reflux.name: Anti-Reflux (Zero Feed-in)
anti_reflux.description: When enabled, prevents the system from exporting energy to the grid. Useful when grid export is not permitted or desired.

ct_enable.name: CT Clamp Enable
ct_enable.description: Enables or disables the CT clamp current sensor. The CT clamp measures actual home consumption for accurate energy balance calculations.

energy_mode.name: Energy Mode
energy_mode.description: Operating mode of the energy management system. 'General': no active control. 'Smart': AI-driven optimisation. 'Custom': manual settings. 'Time of Use': time-block scheduling. 'Manual': full manual control.

max_charge_power.name: Max Charge Power
max_charge_power.description: Maximum allowed battery charging power. Lower this value to reduce grid load or limit the charging rate.

max_feed_power.name: Max Feed-in Power
max_feed_power.description: Maximum allowed power exported to the electricity grid. Set to 0 or use Anti-Reflux to block all export.

discharge_power.name: Discharge Power
discharge_power.description: Battery discharge power in basic mode. Only active when 'Basic Discharge' is enabled.

min_discharge_soc.name: Min Discharge SOC
min_discharge_soc.description: Minimum battery state of charge at which discharging stops. Set this to protect battery longevity.

max_charge_soc.name: Max Charge SOC
max_charge_soc.description: Maximum state of charge to which the battery is charged. Setting below 100% can extend battery lifespan during daily cycling.
